item.description: A seductive witch kills men by casting a spell on them. A bunch of friends are trapped in a haunted house with mysterious lady. Is she the Chudail?

item.title: Surya Kala
item.description: After facing opposition for marriage the lovers Vijay and Haripriya elope. As they decide to stay in a guesthouse on a middle of remote island what follows is series of mysterious deaths of unknown girls one after another and the next girl targeted is Haripriya.

item.title: Pakka Plan
item.description: A bunch of friends are trapped in a haunted house, who are getting killed one by one. The survivors must discover who among them is the killer before he finishes off everybody.
item.tags: Pakka Plan, Movie, Full Movie, Horror, Whacked Out Media, Telugu Movie, Telugu

item.title: Saansein
item.description: Viu Saansein, a story that revolves around Shirin; a beautiful singer at one of the best clubs in Mauritius who mysteriously disappears after her performance. Abhay who comes to Mauritius for a business trip falls for Shirin right away. He is quite determined to find what is actually keeping her away and that`s when he stumbles upon a secret Shirin has. What follows is a harrowing tale that nightmares are made of. What is the secret that Shirin is hiding? And does Abhay manage to bring in peace? Or does he succumb to the fears that knows no boundaries? Watch to find out.

item.title: Rajmahal 2
item.description: Viu Rajmahal 2, the Hindi dubbed version of Tamil Blockbuster Aranmanai 2; a story that starts with the Amman statue (a figurine guarding the village from evil spirits and negative energy) being moved into an underground room during the temple's renovation. At a graveyard somewhere close to the temple, a group of tantric practitioners capitalize on the Amman being made dormant to awaken evil spirits for black magic purposes. During the ritual they inadvertently release a demonic entity that they could not contain. The evil spirit then leaves the graveyard in the form of cloud and moves into the village. The village mendicant-holy man notices the evil spirit and chases it, but could not prevent it from entering the titular palace. How will they hunt the spirit out? Watch to find out!

item.title: Chitram Kadu Nijam
item.description: Chitram Kadu Nijam movie is a dubbed version of Kannada movie 6-5=2 and it is a real story. In 2010 Ramesh and his 5 friends had been to trekking, among them 3 died and 2 disappeared. 9 days later Ramesh's camere was found and Video shot by the late Ramesh.
item.tags: Telugu Movies, Full Movies, Films, Entertainment, VIU, Horror, Thriller, Drama, Chitram Kadu Nijam, Whacked out media

item.title: Kanchana 2
item.description: Viu Tamil Horror Blockbuster Kanchana 2, dubbed in Hindi; a story revolving around a cinematographer called Raghava who is hesitant about watching Horror movies but enjoys watching them. As he suffers from Nyctophobia, he takes his mom everywhere he goes. Over the course of work, he meets Nandhini who wants to shoot a short film based on the premise of horror. Gathering all his courage he agrees to be a part of the film, but the twist in the tale arises when the crew is haunted by not one but five ghosts!

item.title: Ragini MMS 2
item.description: A director decides to shoot a horror movie at a haunted house, but things do not go as planned. People start getting killed and the rest must fight the ghost to stay alive.
item.awards_and_nominations: Kanika Kapoor won the Filmfare Awards for Best Playback Singer - Female, Sandhya Mridul was nominated for Screen Weekly Awards for Best Performance in a Comic Role.
item.character_name: Sunny Leone, Satya Kumar, Rocks, Monali, Maddy, Gina
item.trivia: Sunny Leone wore a bikini for the shower make-out scene, it was then digitally superimposed later to give the appearance of nudity.

item.description: Six friends go to an undisclosed mountain for trekking. They experience strange and unusual incidents which put their lives at risk.

item.title: Horror Story
item.description: A few friends come together to bid farewell to another friend who is going abroad for higher studies. They decide to spend the night in a haunted hotel, which turns out to be the biggest mistake ever.

item.title: Ek Thi Daayan
item.description: Bobo, a famous magician, plans to marry his girlfriend Tamara. Tragedy strikes when he gets scary hallucinations about his dead sister. Left with no other option, he seeks a psychiatrist's help.

item.title: Aavaham 2
item.description: Sudeep along with his wife Amrita Kanwilkar and his daughter Raksha & son Rohan settle in a house they find very peaceful and beautiful situated along the sea-shore. Raksha comes across a doll in the forest near the house. Innocent Raksha brings the spirit influenced doll home. The spirit belongs to Madhu, an evil woman previously killed by Sudeep. She becomes a ghost after her death and is waiting to take vengeance on him and his family members. She tells Sudeep that she would destroy his family through his wife Amrita. What happens next? Watch the full movie to know.
item.tags: Whacked Out Media, Telugu Movies, Full Movies, Aavaham 2

item.title: Bhoot
item.description: The film, Bhoot, is a great horror flick. When a married couple moves into a flat that is haunted by a spirit, a series of inexplicable experiences drive the wife to near madness. Now, the husband must protect his wife to save their marriage.
item.tags: Movie, Full Movie, Bhoot, Ajay Devgn, Urmila Matondkar, Shemaroo Full Movies, Horror
